Name: Juniport Fizz
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Soda from siphon
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into empty chilled glass. TOP with soda from a siphon.
Review: This straightforward fizz benefits from the unusual combination of gin and port.
History: Created in 2007 by Julian de Feral at Milk & Honey, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Juniport Fizz contains 175 calories
